publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1627 Ms Sandra White: Yorkhill Hospital Football Teamâ€”That the Parliament sends a message of support to the Yorkhill Hospital staff football team as it heads off to represent Scotland in the Eurospital 2004 Tournament in San Marino this September; notes that the team is made up of dedicated staff members from the Royal Hospital for Sick Children at Yorkhill in Glasgow and will be playing against teams from hospitals representing other nations across Europe in the spirit of international friendship, and wishes the team every success.
S2M-1627 Yorkhill Hospital Football Team (lodged on 27 August 2004) Alex Neil*, Michael Matheson*, Carolyn Leckie*, Frances Curran*
S2M-1627 Yorkhill Hospital Football Team (lodged on 27 August 2004) Pauline McNeill*
S2M-1627 Yorkhill Hospital Football Team (lodged on 27 August 2004) Mr Adam Ingram*
